thread.title: Wisconsin forward Malayna Johnson out for year with torn ACL
thread.title_full: Wisconsin forward Malayna Johnson out for year with torn ACL

title: Wisconsin forward Malayna Johnson out for year with torn ACL
text:
Wisconsin forward Malayna Johnson out for year with torn ACL AP Oct 21, 2015 at 4:25p ET 0Shares 
MADISON, Wis. (AP) Wisconsin forward Malayna Johnson will miss the 2015-16 season with a torn ACL, nearly a year after teammate and older sister Michala suffered a similar season-ending injury. 
Badgers coach Bobbie Kelsey said Wednesday that Malayna Johnson was injured in practice. She will redshirt this season and have two years of eligibility. 
Malayna Johnson averaged 4 points in about 14 minutes a game last season, playing all 29 contests. 
Her sister, Michala, transferred from Connecticut in 2012. The senior played six games last season and averaged 12.8 points a game before tearing her left ACL on Dec. 4. 
Michala Johnson is returning to the Badgers this season after being granted a medical hardship waiver by the NCAA. 0
